NDSH
Table of Contents

Struct NdshHashCode

Namespace
NDSH.Hashing
Assembly
NDSH.Hashing.dll

Generates a hash code for a value or a sequence of values. This implementation is based on the xxHash32 algorithm, and aims to provide a consistent hash code across different run-times and platforms.
